QuestData.Title: The Siegebrul
QuestData.Description: Worms do not like battle or the surface. They only go where their master tells them.$b$bSo, when in war, kill the master.$b$bSiegebrul Olgrul is the master of worms for the Mightstone drogbar who attack us from the north.$b$bSlay him.
QuestData.CompletionText: Siegbrul Olgrul torments all who serve him. There are evil drogbar, and then there is this foul monster.
QuestData.RewardText: "Siegebrul." Bah!$b$bBefore this war we had no need for such titles.$b$BOlgrul was always just a brute who takes pleasure in the pain of others.
